items.sentence: Tom is the one that usually does the cooking.
Tom is the one that usually does the driving.
Tom is the only one that knows what happened.
Tom found the keys that he thought he'd lost.
To tell the truth, I can't do that very well.
Tom never had an opportunity to learn French.
I'm not really looking forward to doing that.
I asked Tom the same question I'd asked Mary.
I need at least seven hours of sleep a night.
I need a tool for pulling weeds in my garden.
